name: Archery Shooting Quest
description:
Archery Shooting Quest is coming and if you are planing for hunting jungle animals then archery animal hunter game is here for you to improve your archer skills and become ultimate archery master. Archery Shooting Quest is most realistic bow shooting game for hunting beasts.

Features:
- Realistic 3D environment
- Wonderful 3D graphics and realistic animations.
- Ancient archery player with old hunter dress.
- Accurate bow shooting
- smooth controls
- Real time game play animations
- Simple and smooth aiming control
- Tons of missions and objectives
- Easy GUI and Control
